<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Pass a non-verbal communication to the receiver. This command does '''as if''' the sentence was said and triggers the reaction scripts (AI FSM or player's conversation EH). See [[Conversations]] for more details.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> person [[kbReact]] [receiver, topicName, sentenceID(, argumentArray1, argumentArray2, …)]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [receiver, topicName, sentenceID, argumentArray1, argumentArray2, …]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> receiver: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> topicName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> sentenceID: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> argumentArray1toN (Optional): [[Array]] - [argumentName, argumentValue, argumentText, argumentSpeech]:
* argumentName: [[String]]
* argumentValue: [[Code]]
* argumentText: [[String]]
* argumentSpeech: [[Array]] of [[String|Strings]] - each string is an already defined word in config.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code><template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// will trigger '''as if''' unit1 said the sentence (''via'' [[kbTell]])
// unit2's FSM will [[kbReact|react]] accordingly.</value></part></template>
unit1 [[kbReact]] [unit2, "topicName", "speech1"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Conversations]], [[kbAddTopic]], [[kbHasTopic]], [[kbTell]], [[kbWasSaid]], [[kbRemoveTopic]], [[kbAddDatabase]], [[kbAddDatabaseTargets]], [[FSM]], [[FSM Editor]]
